descriptionNullable:
This data was scraped off the trust pilot website and has 11 columns

This data has been gathered since 17th of December 2023

Total Reviews - The total amount of reviews has given on the website

Profile Image - The image/logo of the customer (on trustpilot, the pfp is set to your initials by default)

Customer Name - The name of the customer 

Country Code - The country code the user is located in

Rating - The total rating given to the gym

Date Experienced - The data that this was posted/has been experienced

Review Title - The title of the review posted

Review - the body word of the entire review

Owner - Who owns the site 

Owner Date Posted - The date the owner has posted their reply

Owners Response - The body word of the owners response
title: PureGym Customer Reviews - Sentiment Analysis
